block.p: KASELBAUM-Vivian. Of Bayonne, on September 30, 2000. Cherished daughter of the late Mendel and Rose Kaselbaum. Devoted companion of Jack Schultz. Dear sister of Gertrude Parles and the late Eva, Rose, Yetta, Sarah, Max, Harry, Sam and Ernie. Services will held at Cedar Park Cemetery, Forest Ave, Emerson, NJ, on Monday, October 2, 2000, at 1 PM. For information, ''Wien & Wien,'' 1-800-322-0533.
